title: 2019 Dual Art Contest Wave 2 - Demacia Vice!

replies.body:
I accidentally submitted the wrong dimension ( it was 7px off for length) and I couldn't edit my submission so I re-submitted with a new upload.

Is that okay? I know multiple entries aren't allowed but I couldn't edit my earlier entry :(
Resubmits are fine so long as they come in before entries close :)
I see, thank you so much!
the Ashe: Warmother comic cover has league's logo on the right corner? so we cant use that?

Riot logos are the exception to the "free to use so long as the content is free to access" clause with regards to Riot IP (i.e you can't use them on your work under any circumstances without the explicit permission and endorsement of Riot themselves). I'm not sure how strictly this applies to the League of Legends logo itself (the Riot one is a definite no-go), it may be possible to allow that so I'll chase it up.

So long as it's clearly *not* a Riot logo (and doesn't belong to anyone else either) you could create a spoof of some sort and that would be safe.

tl;dr Riot logo absolutely not, LoL logo possibly I'll ask around, but assume no for now.
You can use the League of Legends logo in your piece given the context :)
Does it have to be hand drawn or can 3D modelling be accepted?
You can use whatever method you like so long as the end result is a 2D image that looks like a comic book cover :)
